body_html:
@peterjc123, I did use the VS2017 prompt, which is why I was so confused. I can build tensorflow just fine by specifying 'cmake -G "Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64"'. I will look into the NVToolExt issue later today.

Edit: should be cmake -G "Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64"

body:
@peterjc123, I did use the VS2017 prompt, which is why I was so confused. I can build tensorflow just fine by specifying 'cmake -G "Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64"'. I will look into the NVToolExt issue later today.

Edit: should be `cmake -G "Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64"`
